sources.description:
Three brothers. One jungle jackpot. Zero chill.
After their estranged father leaves a cryptic map to a hidden fortune from an Aztec pyramid, brothers Geoffrey, Jim, and Michael Noble race to the far away Boca Nueva jungle with Jenny caught in the crossfire. Realizing that they each have a stake in their father‚Äôs fortune, the brothers become competitive.
